Title: Periodic Graph Transformers for Crystal Material Property Prediction - Contribution
key contribution & evidence: Encodes crystal structure as periodic graphs with transformer attention over atomic environments. Achieves state-of-the-art on MatBench for formation energy and bandgap prediction. Symbolic periodicity constraints guide message passing.

Title: Material Property Prediction with Element Attribute Knowledge Graphs and Multimodal Representation Learning - Contribution
key contribution & evidence: Combines element-level knowledge graphs with crystal structure encodings for property prediction. KG embeddings provide compositional priors that improve generalization to novel materials.

Title: An ontology-based product design framework for manufacturability verification and knowledge reuse - Contribution
key contribution & evidence: Uses manufacturing ontology to verify design feasibility and enable knowledge reuse across product families. Ontology-based constraints reduce design iterations by catching manufacturability issues early.

Title: Fine-tuning Large Enterprise Language Models via Ontological Reasoning - Contribution
key contribution & evidence: Fine-tunes LLMs using ontology-derived training data and reasoning chains. Ontological structure improves domain adaptation and factual consistency in enterprise applications.

Title: Graph neural network-enabled manufacturing method classification from engineering drawings - Contribution
key contribution & evidence: Classifies manufacturing methods from engineering drawings using GNNs that encode geometric and topological features. Graph structure captures relational constraints between drawing elements.

Title: Taxonomy-Informed Neural Networks for Smart Manufacturing - Contribution
key contribution & evidence: Injects manufacturing taxonomy into neural architecture via hierarchical attention. Taxonomy-guided representations improve sample efficiency and interpretability for quality prediction.

Title: NeSyGeo: A Neuro-Symbolic Framework for Multimodal Geometric Reasoning Data Generation - Contribution
key contribution & evidence: Generates geometric reasoning data by combining symbolic geometry solvers with neural rendering. Produces verified problem-solution pairs for training multimodal LLMs on geometric tasks.

Title: LLM4CAD: Multimodal Large Language Models for Three-Dimensional Computer-Aided Design Generation - Contribution
key contribution & evidence: Uses multimodal LLMs to generate CAD command sequences from text/image inputs. Symbolic CAD grammar constrains generation to valid parametric operations.

Title: OpenECAD: An efficient visual language model for editable 3D-CAD design - Contribution
key contribution & evidence: Vision-language model generates editable CAD scripts from images. Symbolic CAD representation enables downstream parametric editing and constraint satisfaction.

Title: CadVLM: Bridging Language and Vision in the Generation of Parametric CAD Sketches - Contribution
key contribution & evidence: Generates parametric CAD sketches from multimodal inputs using vision-language pretraining. Symbolic sketch constraints (coincident, tangent, parallel) are respected in outputs.

Title: Adaptive LLM-Symbolic Reasoning via Dynamic Logical Solver Composition - Contribution
key contribution & evidence: Dynamically composes logical solvers based on problem structure detected by LLM. Achieves better accuracy than fixed solver pipelines on heterogeneous reasoning tasks.

Title: Do LLMs Really Adapt to Domains? An Ontology Learning Perspective - Contribution
key contribution & evidence: Evaluates LLM domain adaptation through ontology learning task. Finds LLMs can extract taxonomic relations but struggle with domain-specific axioms without symbolic guidance.

Title: End-to-End Ontology Learning with Large Language Models - Contribution
key contribution & evidence: End-to-end pipeline using LLMs to construct ontologies from text corpora. Combines neural extraction with symbolic consistency checking for valid ontology output.

Title: Voyager: An Open-Ended Embodied Agent with Large Language Models - Contribution
key contribution & evidence: LLM-powered agent that generates executable code skills for Minecraft. Symbolic skill library enables compositional task solving and lifelong learning.

Title: KRISP: Integrating Implicit and Symbolic Knowledge for Open-Domain Knowledge-Based VQA - Contribution
key contribution & evidence: Combines implicit neural knowledge with explicit knowledge graph retrieval for VQA. Symbolic KG provides factual grounding that improves accuracy on knowledge-intensive questions.

Title: Advancing Sustainable Manufacturing: Reinforcement Learning with Adaptive Reward Machine Using an Ontology-Based Approach - Contribution
key contribution & evidence: Uses ontology-based reward machines to structure RL for sustainable job shop scheduling. Ontology defines sustainability metrics; RL optimizes scheduling decisions.

Title: ASAP: Automated Sequence Planning for Complex Robotic Assembly with Physical Feasibility - Contribution
key contribution & evidence: Combines neural feasibility prediction with symbolic sequence planning for assembly. Neural module predicts physical feasibility; symbolic planner ensures valid sequences.

Title: Safe Reinforcement Learning via Shielding under Partial Observability - Contribution
key contribution & evidence: Integrates belief-state shielding with deep RL for safe control under uncertainty. Symbolic shield blocks unsafe actions based on belief over hidden states.

Title: Towards robust shielded reinforcement learning through adaptive constraints and exploration: The fear field framework - Contribution
key contribution & evidence: Proposes adaptive shielding that learns constraint boundaries during training. Fear field mechanism balances exploration with safety constraint satisfaction.

Title: End-to-End Neuro-Symbolic Reinforcement Learning with Textual Explanations - Contribution
key contribution & evidence: Produces human-readable explanations alongside RL policy decisions. Symbolic explanation module provides interpretable rationales for control actions.

Title: Three Pathways to Neurosymbolic Reinforcement Learning with Interpretable Model and Policy Networks - Contribution
key contribution & evidence:
Compares three NeuroSymbolic approaches: symbolic world models, logic-based policies, and hybrid architectures. 
Demonstrates interpretability-performance tradeoffs across pathways.

Title: Detect, Understand, Act: A Neuro-symbolic Hierarchical Reinforcement Learning Framework - Contribution
key contribution & evidence: Hierarchical decomposition with symbolic task planner and neural skill executors. Symbolic layer handles abstract planning; neural modules execute continuous control.

Title: Neurosymbolic Reinforcement Learning with Formally Verified Exploration - Contribution
key contribution & evidence: Integrates formal verification with deep RL for provably safe exploration. Verifier checks proposed actions against safety specifications before execution.

Title: Constrained Decision Transformer for Offline Safe Reinforcement Learning - Contribution
key contribution & evidence: Extends decision transformers with constraint satisfaction for offline safe RL. Symbolic constraints guide sequence modeling to produce safe policies from offline data.

Title: The Neuro-Symbolic Concept Learner: Interpreting Scenes, Words, and Sentences From Natural Supervision - Contribution
key contribution & evidence: Jointly learns visual concepts and semantic parsing from natural supervision. Symbolic program executor reasons over learned concepts for compositional generalization.

Title: Integrating symbolic reasoning into neural generative models for design generation - Contribution
key contribution & evidence: Compiles symbolic design rules into neural generator via constraint-aware training. Generated designs satisfy encoded rules without post-hoc filtering.

Title: McGAN: Generating manufacturable designs by embedding manufacturing rules into conditional generative adversarial network - Contribution
key contribution & evidence: Embeds manufacturing constraints directly into GAN discriminator. Generator learns to produce designs that satisfy manufacturability rules by construction.

Title: A complete Physics-Informed Neural Network-based framework for structural topology optimization - Contribution
key contribution & evidence: Complete ML-based topology optimization using dual PINNs for analysis and sensitivity. Physics equations encoded as loss terms; achieves FEA-comparable results without labeled data.

Title: DL2: Training and Querying Neural Networks with Logic - Contribution
key contribution & evidence: Framework for expressing first-order logic constraints over network outputs as differentiable loss. Enables constraint-aware training and logical querying of trained models.

Title: A Semantic Loss Function for Deep Learning with Symbolic Knowledge - Contribution
key contribution & evidence: Derives differentiable loss from propositional logic constraints via weighted model counting. Enables gradient-based optimization subject to logical specifications.

Title: NeurCADRecon: Neural Representation for Reconstructing CAD Surfaces by Enforcing Zero Gaussian Curvature - Contribution
key contribution & evidence: Reconstructs CAD surfaces by enforcing zero Gaussian curvature as geometric constraint in neural SDF. Produces cleaner analytical surfaces suitable for downstream CAD operations.

Title: Geometry-Informed Neural Networks - Contribution
key contribution & evidence: Incorporates geometric constraints (e.g., curvature bounds, thickness) as differentiable losses for shape optimization. Improves manufacturability of generated geometries.

Title: Scientific Machine Learning Through Physics–Informed Neural Networks: Where we are and What’s Next - Contribution
key contribution & evidence: Complete ML-based topology optimization using dual PINNs for analysis and sensitivity. Physics equations encoded as loss terms; achieves FEA-comparable results without labeled data.

Title: SATNet: Bridging deep learning and logical reasoning using a differentiable satisfiability solver - Contribution
key contribution & evidence: Differentiable MaxSAT solver as neural layer enabling backpropagation through logical constraints. Learns to solve combinatorial problems end-to-end with gradient descent.

Title: OptNet: Differentiable Optimization as a Layer in Neural Networks - Contribution
key contribution & evidence: Implements quadratic programs as differentiable neural network layers. Enables end-to-end learning through constrained optimization with exact gradients via implicit differentiation.

Title: Differentiable Convex Optimization Layers - Contribution
key contribution & evidence: General framework for differentiating through disciplined convex programs. Enables embedding arbitrary convex constraints as layers in deep learning pipelines.

Title: NURBS-Diff: A Differentiable Programming Module for NURBS - Contribution
key contribution & evidence: Differentiable NURBS evaluation enabling gradient-based optimization of CAD geometry. Bridges neural networks with industry-standard B-rep representations.

Title: Neural probabilistic logic programming in DeepProbLog - Contribution
key contribution & evidence: Integrates neural predicates into probabilistic logic programs with end-to-end differentiability. Combines logical reasoning with neural perception in unified probabilistic framework.

Title: The third AI summer: AAAI Robert S. Engelmore Memorial Lecture - Contribution
key contribution & evidence: Introduces six-type taxonomy for neurosymbolic integration (Types I-VI). Foundational classification used throughout this survey for organizing NS methods.

Title: Neurosymbolic AI: the 3rd wave - Contribution
key contribution & evidence: Comprehensive overview of NS-AI motivations, architectures, and applications. Argues NS integration addresses limitations of pure neural and pure symbolic approaches.

Title: Neural-Symbolic Learning and Reasoning: A Survey and Interpretation - Contribution
key contribution & evidence: Systematic survey of NS learning and reasoning techniques. Covers knowledge extraction, injection, and hybrid architectures with historical perspective.

Title: A survey on neural-symbolic learning systems - Contribution
key contribution & evidence: Surveys neural-symbolic integration focusing on learning systems. Categorizes approaches by knowledge representation and integration mechanism.

Title: Neuro-Symbolic AI in 2024: A Systematic Review - Contribution
key contribution & evidence: Systematic review of NS-AI literature through 2024. Identifies trends, benchmarks, and open challenges in the field.

Title: Neuro-symbolic artificial intelligence: a survey - Contribution
key contribution & evidence: Broad survey covering NS-AI goals, methods, and applications. Discusses integration strategies and evaluation approaches.

Title: Neurosymbolic Reinforcement Learning and Planning: A Survey - Contribution
key contribution & evidence: Focused survey on NS methods for RL and planning. Covers symbolic state abstraction, reward shaping, and policy constraints.

Title: A Roadmap Toward Neurosymbolic Approaches in AI Design - Contribution
key contribution & evidence: Roadmap for applying NS-AI to design automation. Identifies research gaps and opportunities in CAD, manufacturing, and engineering design.

Title: A Survey on Verification and Validation, Testing and Evaluations of Neurosymbolic Artificial Intelligence - Contribution
key contribution & evidence: Surveys V&V methods for NS-AI systems. Covers testing strategies, formal verification, and evaluation benchmarks.

Title: A review of neuro-symbolic AI integrating reasoning and learning for advanced cognitive systems - Contribution
key contribution & evidence: Reviews NS integration for cognitive systems. Discusses reasoning-learning synergies and cognitive architecture implications.

Title: A review of some techniques for inclusion of domain-knowledge into deep neural networks - Contribution
key contribution & evidence: Reviews techniques for injecting domain knowledge into DNNs. Covers architecture design, loss modification, and data augmentation strategies.

Title: Neural-Symbolic Learning Systems - Contribution
key contribution & evidence: Foundational book on neural-symbolic integration. Covers theoretical foundations and early integration approaches.

Title: Fast relational learning using bottom clause propositionalization with artificial neural networks - Contribution
key contribution & evidence: Proposes method for converting relational features to neural-compatible representations. Foundational work on symbolic-to-neural knowledge transfer.

Title: Benchmarking Neurosymbolic Description Logic Reasoners: Existing Challenges and a Way Forward - Contribution
key contribution & evidence: Benchmarks NS reasoners on description logic tasks. Provides evaluation framework for comparing NS reasoning approaches.
